entry.title: How to Build Real-Time Chat App with Laravel Reverb
entry.summary: In March of 2024, Laravel 11 was released [https://blog.laravel.com/laravel-11-now-available]. And with it arrived a new tool in the Laravel ecosystem: Laravel Reverb [https://reverb.laravel.com/].
